entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. 40 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:24 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
